meanings.sent1: The path was pebbly, making it tricky to walk on.
meanings.sent2: The beach had a pebbly shore, perfect for collecting unique stones.
meanings.sent3: The pebbly driveway made the car bounce like a bumpy ride at the amusement park.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a pebbly quality, rough yet oddly soothing.
meanings.sent5: The pebbly texture of the wall reminded him of a rough sandpaper.

meanings.definition: Having a surface with small, rounded stones.
meanings.sent1: The pebbly ground felt cool under his bare feet.
meanings.sent2: The garden path was pebbly, creating a charming and rustic look.
meanings.sent3: The pebbly texture of the cake frosting added a surprising crunch.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as pebbly as the gravel road, full of hidden depths.
meanings.sent5: The pebbly surface of the pond shimmered in the sunlight, like a bed of jewels.
